mapper.insert: /* 상담원 배정 등록 insertEventAgentList */ insert into tbl_eval_event_agent_list ( user_id, eval_user_id, eval_user_name, user_name ,bpart_code, bpart_name, mpart_code, mpart_name, spart_code, spart_name ,local_no, eval_cnt, eval_status, regi_datm, regi_ip, regi_id ) select top 1 A.user_id ,#{eval_user_id} ,#{eval_user_name} ,A.user_name ,A.bpart_code ,B.part_name as bpart_name ,A.mpart_code ,C.part_name as mpart_name ,A.spart_code ,D.part_name as spart_name ,A.local_no ,0 ,'0' ,getdate() ,#{regi_ip} ,#{regi_id} from tbl_user A WITH(NOLOCK) ,tbl_user_group B WITH(NOLOCK) ,tbl_user_group C WITH(NOLOCK) ,tbl_user_group D WITH(NOLOCK) where A.user_id = #{user_id} and A.bpart_code = B.bpart_code and B.part_depth = 1 and A.bpart_code = C.bpart_code and A.mpart_code = C.mpart_code and C.part_depth = 2 and A.bpart_code = D.bpart_code and A.mpart_code = D.mpart_code and A.spart_code = D.spart_code and D.part_depth = 3 and (select top 1 user_id from tbl_eval_event_agent_list WITH(NOLOCK) where user_id = #{user_id} and eval_user_id = #{eval_user_id}) is null
